item.title: Immigr8: Improving the journey of Migrant workers
item.description: Summary In our globalized world there is increased economic migration to high income countries like Canada. Economic migrants face the problem of finding relevant information without wasting precious time. The concept of a crowdsourced AI platform was proposed as a solution - by providing personalized information based on the userâ€™s unique profile. A multi-sided business model was designed with big picture numbers showing profitability in 3 years. Challenge To explore and identity opportunities for innovation along the Migrant worker’s immigration journey, to ideate and evaluate solutions and to create a strategy for the implementation of the tested strategy.
